h2. Pricing

Discover our very attractive pricing and freedom to finetune a package to your needs!

{{html:
<br>
<div ng-app="cloudscalers">
<h4> Machine Buckets </h4>
<div  ng-controller="MachinePricingController"     class="dbox">
<span>Use the sliders to configure the requirements for your Virtual Machine</span>  <br><br>

   <span> {[cpuMemList[cpuMem].mem]} </span> Memory, 
   <span> {[cpuMemList[cpuMem].cores]} </span>
   <ng-pluralize count="cpuMemList[cpuMem].cores"
                  when="{'one': 'Core',
                      'other': 'Cores'}">
   </ng-pluralize>, 
   <span> {[cpuMemList[cpuMem].primary]} </span> GB at SSD speed, 
   Unlimited Transfer - <span> {[cpuMemList[cpuMem].price]} </span> USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="9" step="1" ng-model="cpuMem"></div>
   <br>
 
   <span> {[storageList[storage].size]} </span> SSD -
   <span> {[storageList[storage].price]} </span> USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="9" step="1" ng-model="storage"></div>
   <br>

   <span> {[archiveList[archive].size]} </span> Archive/Backup -
   <span> {[archiveList[archive].price]} </span> USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="9" step="1" ng-model="archive"></div>
   <br>


   <span>{[locationsList[location].number]}</span>
   <ng-pluralize count="locationsList[location].number"
                 when="{'one': 'replication location',
                     'other': 'replication locations'}">
   </ng-pluralize>
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="2" step="1" ng-model="location"></div>
   <br>
   <p>
   <span>Total price:</span> <span class="total">{[totalPrice]}</span> USD/month
   </p>
</div>
<div ng-controller="DesktopPricingController" >
<h4> Desktop Buckets </h4>
<div  class="dbox">
<span>Creating a desktop is super easy, with a per user pricing!</span>  <br><br>
    Number of users <input id="numOfUsers" name="numOfUsers" ng-model="numOfUsers" /><br>
   <br><p>
    <span>Total price:</span> <span class="total">{[totalPrice]}</span> USD/month
	</p>
</div>
<h4> Storage Buckets </h4>
<div class="dbox">
<span>Be amazed by our protected storage pricing!</span>  <br><br>
    Number of TB <input id="numOfTB" name="numOfTB" ng-model="numOfTB" /><br>
	<br><p>  
    <span>Total price:</span> <span class="total">{[totalPriceOfStorage]}</span> USD/month
	</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
}}
